QuestData.Title: Speak to Shakes
QuestData.Description: Let's not leave Captain O'Breen waiting. He'll want to see these gems first hand. After all, that's why we're here!$b$bAnd after a few weeks of consorting with these pirates, the professor and I have realized the last thing that's good for our health is to be caught hanging on to their treasure.$b$bHere, $n, take these to O'Breen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Elven Gems to Captain O'Breen at Faldir's Cove in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ahoy, $c. What brings you to the bridge?
QuestData.RewardText: So the little gnomes proved their worth after all? I knew we kept those ankle biters around for a reason!
